label: logicC:weather_en
steps: [1] If a frontal system approaches the region, cloud cover increases.
[2] If cloud cover increases, precipitation becomes likely.
[3] If precipitation is likely and temperatures are below freezing, snowfall is expected.
[5] A frontal system is approaching the region.
[6] For any city x, if x is coastal, then x has high humidity.
[8] For any city x, if x has high humidity, then x gets either morning fog or afternoon showers.
[12] Lisbon has high humidity and will see either morning fog or afternoon showers.
